title: Crypto Trading Fundamentals
description: This self-learning plan offers a comprehensive introduction to the world of cryptocurrency trading, covering essential topics, learning objectives, and weekly tasks to help beginners navigate the crypto market.

weeks.title: Introduction to Cryptocurrencies and Trading
learningObjectives: Understand what cryptocurrencies are and how they work
Learn about the history of cryptocurrencies
Familiarize with basic trading concepts and terminology
topicsToCover: History and evolution of Bitcoin and altcoins
Basic trading concepts: exchanges, wallets, orders, and trades
weeklyTasks: Create a demo account on a cryptocurrency exchange
Explore different types of cryptocurrency wallets
Practice placing buy and sell orders using a demo account

resources.name: Cryptocurrency Trading: A Beginner's Guide by Blockgeeks

weeks.title: Technical Analysis and Market Indicators
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of technical analysis
Learn about key market indicators and chart patterns
Explore tools and platforms for technical analysis
topicsToCover: Common chart patterns and what they signify
Key market indicators: volume, RSI, MACD
weeklyTasks: Analyze historical price charts of major cryptocurrencies
Identify common chart patterns and indicators in real-time market data
Use technical analysis tools on a trading platform

resources.name: Technical Analysis of the Financial Markets by John J. Murphy
Cryptocurrency Technical Analysis Fundamentals by CoinMarketCap

weeks.title: Trading Strategies and Risk Management
learningObjectives: Explore different trading strategies used in crypto trading
Understand the importance of risk management
Learn about setting stop-loss and take-profit orders
topicsToCover: Overview of trading strategies: day trading, swing trading, scalping
weeklyTasks: Develop a simple trading strategy based on technical analysis
Practice risk management by setting stop-loss and take-profit orders
Evaluate the performance of your trading strategy using a demo account

resources.name: The Art and Science of Technical Analysis by Adam Grimes
Risk Management in Cryptocurrency Trading by Binance Academy

weeks.title: Advanced Topics and Keeping Up with the Market
learningObjectives: Learn about advanced trading concepts and tools
Understand the impact of news and market sentiment on crypto prices
Explore resources for staying informed about the crypto market
topicsToCover: The impact of news, events, and market sentiment
Resources for crypto market news and analysis
weeklyTasks: Explore a trading platform that offers leverage and margin trading
Analyze how recent news events affected cryptocurrency prices
Subscribe to newsletters and follow influencers for market insights

resources.name: Cryptoassets: The Innovative Investor's Guide to Bitcoin and Beyond by Chris Burniske and Jack Tatar
Daily cryptocurrency news and analysis by CoinDesk
